thread.title: Former Frankly CEO Steve Chung Joins Major U.S. Media Company as a Senior Executive

author: cnbc.com
title: Former Frankly CEO Steve Chung Joins Major U.S. Media Company as a Senior Executive
text:
LONG ISLAND CITY, N.Y., April 12, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Frankly Inc. (TSX VENTURE: TLK) (Frankly ), a leader in transforming local TV broadcasters and media companies by enabling them to publish and monetize their digital content across multiple platforms, announced that Steve Chung, company founder and former CEO, has joined a major U.S. media company in a senior executive position.
For additional details about Chung's appointment, please reference the associated release on TVNewsCheck .
About Frankly
Frankly (TSX VENTURE: TLK) builds an integrated software platform for media companies to create, distribute, analyze and monetize their content across all of their digital properties on web, mobile and TV. Its customers include NBC, ABC, CBS and FOX affiliates. The company is headquartered in in New York. To learn more, visit www.franklyinc.com .
Neither TSX Venture Exchange nor its Regulation Services Provider (as that term is defined in policies of the TSX Venture Exchange) accepts responsibility for the adequacy or accuracy of this release.
